person.persName: Aderin J. Harris (Union County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Harris. Father of Susan M. Harris, Cornelia Harris, Anna Harris, John Harris, Lue Harris, Charles Harris, and Miller Harris. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, p. 34.; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, p. 12.; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 27.
